analysis: The project currently lacks a cohesive black hole theme with animated elements. The CSS and HTML files need updates to incorporate cosmic visuals, animations, and interactive elements related to black holes. The JavaScript file should be enhanced to include functionality for animations and user interactions.

improvements.description: Add CSS animations for black hole visuals, including swirling effects, glowing elements, and cosmic backgrounds.
Complete the HTML structure to include sections for black hole information, interactive elements, and animated slides.
Implement JavaScript functions to handle animations, user interactions, and dynamic content updates related to black holes.
